Since the aliens are at the very top of the map (row = 0), I have an opportunity to attack them. I should use my 'sam' missile to engage one of the aliens. While I cannot directly shoot to the top from my current position, using the missiles is the best strategy to clear threats before they come down.

Thus, I will execute the action to shoot my missile upwards.

By using this action, I expect to successfully eliminate one of the aliens, thereby advancing towards the primary objective of destroying all aliens before my avatar is in danger.
